name: AccessoryModules
description: The "AccessoryModules" Library is a C++ library providing interfaces and implementations for various accessory modules like lightbulb, fan, door lock, shade, etc. It enables easy integration into ESP32/Arduino projects, offering methods for controlling and managing different accessory types.
keywords: Accessory Modules, IoT, Home Automation, HomeKit, Alexa, Google Assistant, Arduino Library, ESP32 Library, Smart Home, MetaHouse
